name: Divinity: Original Sin
blurb: Divinity Original Sin is an old-school cRPG with new ideas & modern execution, will release this year. Funded by fantastic backers!

rewards.reward: No Reward

Gratitude ============================= Thank you for your pledge! For this sign of support, we here at Larian Studios give you our eternal gratitude.
============================== 
(*) = NOTES FOR REWARDS
============================= DIVINITY ORIGINAL SIN will be DRM-free, and will be localized in English, French, German, Polish and Russian. Additional languages may be added. The game will initially be available for PC. If Mac and Linux versions -and other languages- become available they will be free to owners of PC copies (digitally). Digital copies will have to be downloaded via your preferred digital retailer such as Steam or GOG.com if available. ============================= 
ALPHA version access is expected Summer 2013.

Kickstarter Potion ============================= You will receive a unique personalized code that will unlock a Kickstarter potion in your game. Drinking this potion will do several things to the game showing you how much we appreciate your support. (Potion will not affect the game balance.)

Divinity Original Sin Digital Copy ============================= You get a digital copy of Divinity: Original Sin for Windows PC, Mac or Linux(*) via your preferred digital retailer such as Steam or GOG.com if available. Digital copies come with a digital manual. This low price is only available to those who help fund. \r\n ============================= This also includes: Kickstarter Potion

Divinity Original Sin Digital Copy
 ============================= 
You get a digital copy of Divinity: Original Sin for Windows PC, Mac or Linux(*) via your preferred digital retailer such as Steam or GOG.com. Digital copies come with a digital manual. ============================= 
This also includes: 
Kickstarter Potion 
 + 
Zandalor's Epic Trunks of Intelligence

Soundtrack Digital Download ============================= You get a downloadable soundtrack with music from the game, offered in several formats (yes, that means lossless).\r\n ============================= This also includes: Kickstarter Potion + Divinity Original Sin Digital Copy

Digital Duo Pack Divinity Original Sin ============================= You get TWO digital copies of Divinity: Original Sin for Windows PC, Mac or Linux(*) via your preferred digital retailer such as Steam or GOG.com if available. Digital copies come with a digital manual.  This low price is only available to those who help fund. \r\n ============================= This also includes: Kickstarter Potion + Soundtrack Digital Download

Developer's Cut Digital (Documents and Videos) ============================== A digital version of all the behind the scenes materials such as concept art, design documents, in-house videos, presentations etc\u2026 This will give you a unique insight in how the game came to be.\r\n ============================= This also includes: Kickstarter Potion + Digital Duo Pack Divinity Original Sin + Soundtrack Digital Download

Divinity Dragon Commander Digital Copy ============================= Two games, two times the fun! You'll recieve a code for Dragon Commander as soon as it is released (ETA July 2013). You won't have to wait for your Divinity Fix with this package! Dragon Commander Digital Edition will be DRM-free, and will be localized in English, French, German, Polish and Russian. Additional languages may be added. The game will initially be available for PC. If Mac and Linux versions, and other languages, become available they will be free to owners of PC copies (digitally). Digital copies will have to be downloaded via your preferred digital retailer such as Steam or GOG.com if available.  This low price is only available to those who help fund. \r\n ============================= This also includes: Kickstarter Potion + Divinity Original Sin Digital Copy + Soundtrack Digital Download + Developer's Cut Digital (Documents and Videos)

Divinity Original Sin Box Copy with Printed Manual ============================= This boxed copy of the game includes a DVD version of the game and a printed manual.\r\n ============================= This also includes: Kickstarter Potion + Divinity Original Sin Digital Copy + Soundtrack Digital Download + Developer's Cut Digital (Documents and Videos)

Divinity Original Sin Box Copy with Printed Manual, Digital Artbook, and Digital Map ============================= This boxed copy of the game includes a DVD version of the game and a printed manual. It also includes digital versions of the artbook and the map. ============================= This also includes: Kickstarter Potion + Divinity Original Sin Digital Copy + Soundtrack Digital Download + Developer's Cut Digital (Documents and Videos)

Divinity Dragon Commander Digital Copy
 ============================= 
Two games, two times the fun! You'll recieve a code for Dragon Commander as soon as it is released (ETA July 2013). You won't have to wait for your Divinity Fix with this package! Dragon Commander Digital Edition will be DRM-free, and will be localized in English, French, German, Polish and Russian. The game will initially be available for Windows. As Mac and Linux versions, and other languages, become available, they will be free to owners of Windows copies (digitally). Digital copies will have to be downloaded via your preferred digital retailer such as Steam or GOG.com. 
 ============================= 
This also includes: 
Kickstarter Potion
 + 
Zandalor's Epic Trunks of Intelligence
 + 
Digital Duo Pack Divinity Original Sin
 + 
Soundtrack Digital Download
 + 
Developer's Cut Digital (Documents and Videos)
 + 
Message in the woods
 + 
Credited as Backer

ALL DIGITAL TIER 
============================= 
NOTE: All tiers above $95 now include Dragon Commander! 
============================= 
Divinity Dragon Commander Digital Copy 
============================= 
Two games, two times the fun! You'll recieve a code for Dragon Commander as soon as it is released (ETA July 2013). You won't have to wait for your Divinity Fix with this package! Dragon Commander Digital Edition will be DRM-free, and will be localized in English, French, German, Polish and Russian. The game will initially be available for Windows. As Mac and Linux versions, and other languages, become available they will be free to owners of PC copies (digitally). Digital copies will have to be downloaded via your preferred digital retailer such as Steam or GOG.com if available. This low price is only available to those who help fund. 
============================= 
Divinity: Original Sin Beta Access 
============================= 
You get early access to the game! You'll be invited to play (and toy around with) the beta version of the game which will be made available through digital download. 
============================= 
This also includes: 2 Kickstarter Potions + Zandalor's Trunks of Epic Intelligence + Message in the Woods + Divinity Original Sin Digital Duo Pack (2 Digital Copies) + Soundtrack Digital Download + Developer's Cut Digital (Developer's Documents and Documentary) + Credited as a Backer, Dragon Tier + A Kickstarter Backer Forum Badge On Larian.com Dragon Tier

Divinity Original Sin Kickstarter Box Copy with Printed Manual, Soundtrack CD and Cloth Map ============================= This special Kickstarter box includes a DVD version of the game, a printed manual, an audio CD version of the game's soundtrack, and a cloth map of the game world.\r\n ============================= This also includes: Kickstarter Potion + Divinity Original Sin Digital Copy + Developer's Cut Digital (Documents and Videos)

PHYSICAL TIER ============================= \r\nNOTE: This physical tier does not include Dragon Commander. ============================= \r\nDivinity Original Sin Kickstarter Box Copy with Printed Manual, Soundtrack CD, Artbook and Cloth Map ============================= This special Kickstarter Collector's box includes a DVD version of the game, a printed manual, an audio CD version of the game's soundtrack, an artbook, and a cloth map of the game world. ============================= This also includes: Kickstarter Potion + Zandalor's Trunks of Epic Intelligence + Engraving Tool + Message in the Woods + Listed in the Credits, Dragon Tier + Dragon Forum Badge on Larian.com + Divinity Original Sin Digital Copy + Developer's Cut Digital (Developer's Documents and Documentary)

Message in a Bottle ============================= You will receive a unique personalized code that unlocks a personal message in your copy of the game. You write the message! This message will be written on a scroll within a bottle, and will inconspicuously wash ashore in the beginning of the game. You can give the message to any person you'll be playing Divinity: Original Sin with. =============================
Listed in the Credits ============================= You will be listed in the credits at Council level. =============================
Beta Access ============================= You get early access to the game! You'll be invited to play (and toy around with) the beta version of the game which will be made available through digital download.
 ============================= This also includes: Kickstarter Potion + Digital Duo Pack Divinity Original Sin + Soundtrack Digital Download + Developer's Cut Digital (Documents and Videos)

Name the Undead ============================= You will be able to name one of the undead creatures in the first area of the game. This name will only show up in your copy of the game by using a unique personalized unlock code. Near the starting village, there is a place known as the Black Cove. Within the black cove are a number of ghosts. You could be one of them! (Well, we mean, at least, one will carry a name you give them, you won't actually become a ghost, obviously.)\r\n ============================= This also includes: Kickstarter Potion + Digital Duo Pack Divinity Original Sin + Soundtrack Digital Download + Developer's Cut Digital (Documents and Videos) + Message in a Bottle + Beta Access + Listed in the Credits at Council level

ALL DIGITAL TIER 
============================= 
Alpha Access 
============================= 
Early beta access is not early enough? Alpha access grants even earlier access! You will receive an earlier early access code to get digital downloads of the alpha builds. 
============================= 
Name the Undead 
============================= 
You will be able to name one of the undead creatures in the first area of the game. This name will only show up in your copy of the game by using a unique personalized unlock code. Near the starting village, there is a place known as the Black Cove. Within the black cove are a number of ghosts. You could be one of them! (Well, we mean, at least, one will carry a name you give them, you won't actually become a ghost, obviously.) 
============================= 
This also includes: 2 Kickstarter Potions + Zandalor's Trunks of Epic Intelligence + Message in the Woods + Divinity Original Sin Digital Duo Pack (2 Digital Copies) + Soundtrack Digital Download + Developer's Cut Digital (Developer's Documents and Documentary) + Credited as a Backer, Dragon Tier and Developer Tier + A Kickstarter Backer Forum Badge On Larian.com Dragon Tier and Developer Tier + Digital Artbook + Digital Map

ALL DIGITAL TIER 
============================= 
Kirill's Early Work 
============================= 
This includes over 300 sketches of ideas he had for Divinity 2 songs. These were never heard outside of this office! (Sketches are rough ideas, sometimes only a piano, sometimes fully orchestrated musical pieces, but seldom well mixed or produced.) A must have for Kirill's fans! 
============================= 
Name A Pet 
============================= 
As Source users, the heroes of Divinity: Original sin can talk to animals, and there are several quests that involve the help of man's best friends. In your version of the game, using a unique personalized unlock code, one animal will carry the name of your choosing! We can customize the animal's visuals to a certain extent, and we will accommodate if possible. 
============================= 
This also includes: 2 Kickstarter Potions + Zandalor's Trunks of Epic Intelligence + Message in the Woods + Divinity Original Sin Digital Duo Pack (2 Digital Copies) + Soundtrack Digital Download + Developer's Cut Digital (Developer's Documents and Documentary) + Credited as a Backer, Dragon Tier and Developer Tier + A Kickstarter Backer Forum Badge On Larian.com Dragon Tier and Developer Tier + Digital Artbook + Digital Map + Name An Undead + Alpha Access

In your version of the game, using a unique personalized unlock code, one animal will carry the name of your choosing! We can customize the animal's visuals to a certain extent, and we will accommodate if possible.
=============================

Name the Summon ============================= When an elemental is summoned, from the fiery depths, from the watery abyss, from the howling skies, or from the darkest cores of the earth, its name shall be drawn by the hands of the gods, and proclaimed to all that lay eyes on these awe-inspiring abominations of nature. \r\nBackers that pledge this new $175 tier, or above, will be invited to guide the hands of the gods, by providing them with a database of names and descriptions (backgrounds) to randomly draw from. Your creative endeavor will be in the final game for everyone to see. ============================= This also includes: \r\nKickstarter Potion + Divinity Original Sin Kickstarter Box Copy with Printed Manual, Soundtrack CD and Cloth Map + Divinity Original Sin Digital Copy + Soundtrack Digital Download + Developer's Cut Digital (Documents and Videos) + Message in a Bottle + Beta Access + Listed in the Credits at Council level + Name the Undead + Alpha Access + Name a Pet

ALL DIGITAL TIER 
============================= 
Name The Summon 
============================= 
When an creature is summoned, from the fiery depths, from the watery abyss, from the howling skies, or from the darkest cores of the earth, its name shall be drawn by the hands of the gods, and proclaimed to all that lay eyes on these awe-inspiring abominations of nature. You will be invited to guide the hands of the gods, by providing them with a pool of names and descriptions (backgrounds) to randomly draw from. Your creative endeavor will be in the final game for everyone to see. 
============================= 
Design A Henchman 
============================= 
We will gather names, stats and looks, and put them in one big pool of Kickstarter-created henchmen. Every player will be able to hire these henchmen via representatives of the inter-dimensional mercenaries guild. Depending on your personal preferences (do you need a healer, a priest, a ranger, a rogue...) the agent will make a recommendation and you will then be able to hire them. 
============================= 
This also includes: 2 Kickstarter Potions + Zandalor's Trunks of Epic Intelligence + Message in the Woods + Divinity Original Sin Digital Duo Pack (2 Digital Copies) + Soundtrack Digital Download + Developer's Cut Digital (Developer's Documents and Documentary) + Credited as a Backer, Dragon Tier and Developer Tier + A Kickstarter Backer Forum Badge On Larian.com Dragon Tier and Developer Tier + Digital Artbook + Digital Map + Name An Undead + Alpha Access + Kirill's Early Work + Name A Pet

Write a Dialog ============================= Receive a unique personalized code that unlocks a cooperative dialog that you have written! You can start up this dialog in your version of the game by clicking a unique item, with any person you'll be playing with. We'll implement your dialog and send you instructions on how to activate it. (If she says yes, do drop us a note!)\r\n ============================= This also includes: Kickstarter Potion + Divinity Original Sin Kickstarter Box Copy with Printed Manual, Soundtrack CD and Cloth Map + Divinity Original Sin Digital Copy + Soundtrack Digital Download + Developer's Cut Digital (Documents and Videos) + Message in a Bottle + Beta Access + Listed in the Credits at Council level + Name the Undead + Alpha Access + Name a Pet

Design a Henchman ============================= When the going gets tough, you can always hire henchmen to bolster your party. This reward allows you to design one of the henchmen in your game. We will send you guidelines by which you can design a henchman so that he reflects your playing style and looks. Of course you'll get to name him. You will receive a unique personalized code that unlocks your personal henchman in your copy of the game.  \r\n ============================= This also includes: Kickstarter Potion + Divinity Original Sin Kickstarter Box Copy with Printed Manual, Soundtrack CD and Cloth Map + Divinity Original Sin Digital Copy + Soundtrack Digital Download + Developer's Cut Digital (Documents and Videos) + Message in a Bottle + Beta Access + Name the Undead + Alpha Access + Listed in the Credits at Council level + Name a Pet + Write a Dialog

Signed Divinity Original Sin Kickstarter Box Copy with Printed Manual, Soundtrack CD and Cloth Map ============================= The special Kickstarter box signed by the entire team! Apart from our scribbles and doodles, it will include a DVD version of the game, a printed manual, an audio CD version of the game's soundtrack, and a cloth map of the game world. \r\n ============================= This also includes: Kickstarter Potion + Divinity Original Sin Digital Copy + Soundtrack Digital Download + Developer's Cut Digital (Documents and Videos) + Message in a Bottle + Beta Access + Name the Undead + Alpha Access + Name a Pet + Listed in the Credits at Council level + Write a Dialog + Name a Henchman

Combo Designer ============================= In the game, objects can be combined to create all sorts of items. For your support, we will work together with you and implement one of your creative combinations (within the boundaries and logic of our fantasy world). This item combination will be in the final game, for everyone to find out about, and enjoy! 
=============================  
Limited Edition Zandalor's Cards 
============================= 
Used by Zandalor when summoning the Divine. A limited edition Major Arcana tarrot deck with pictures from important characters in Rivellon. Includes Zandalor's prophecy book for predicting what's going to happen next. ============================= Listed in the Credits, Dragon Level ============================= You will be listed in the credits at Dragon level. 
 ============================= This also includes: Kickstarter Potion + Signed Divinity Original Sin Kickstarter Box Copy with Printed Manual, Soundtrack CD and Cloth Map + Divinity Original Sin Digital Copy + Soundtrack Digital Download + Developer's Cut Digital (Documents and Videos) + Message in a Bottle + Beta Access + Name the Undead + Alpha Access + Name a Pet + Write a Dialog + Name a Henchman

Divinity Fan ============================= For your generosity, we will grant you immediate access to every published Larian Studios game for the next ten years. (You will receive a download code on day of digital release.) =============================\r\nPhysical Signed Concept Art ============================= We will send you a limited edition, signed version of a piece of concept art: a limited amount of high-quality prints of a certain piece of concept art, will be signed by the artist (and if you want, by the entire team).\r\n ============================= This also includes: Kickstarter Potion + Signed Divinity Original Sin Kickstarter Box Copy with Printed Manual, Soundtrack CD and Cloth Map + Divinity Original Sin Digital Copy + Soundtrack Digital Download + Developer's Cut Digital (Documents and Videos) + Message in a Bottle + Beta Access + Listed in the Credits, Dragon Level + Name the Undead + Alpha Access + Name a Pet + Write a Dialog + Name a Henchman + Combo Designer + Limited Edition Zandalor's Cards

More Divinity Fans ============================= The early birds were rewarded, but here's another chance! For your generosity, we will grant you immediate access to every published Larian Studios game for the next ten years. (You will receive a download code on day of digital release.) ============================= Physical Signed Concept Art ============================= We will send you a limited edition, signed version of a piece of concept art: a limited amount of high-quality prints of a certain piece of concept art, will be signed by the artist (and if you want, by the entire team). ============================= This also includes: Kickstarter Potion + Signed Divinity Original Sin Kickstarter Box Copy with Printed Manual, Soundtrack CD and Cloth Map + Divinity Original Sin Digital Copy + Soundtrack Digital Download + Developer's Cut Digital (Documents and Videos) + Message in a Bottle + Beta Access + Listed in the Credits, Dragon Level + Name the Undead + Alpha Access + Name a Pet + Write a Dialog + Name a Henchman + Combo Designer + Limited Edition Zandalor's Cards

Even More Divinity Fans
 ============================= 
The early birds were rewarded, but here's another chance! For your generosity, we will grant you immediate access to every published Larian Studios game for the next ten years. (You will receive a download code on day of digital release. Yes, that does include Divinity: Dragon Commander!) 
 ============================= 
Physical Signed Concept Art
 ============================= 
We will send you a limited edition, signed version of a piece of concept art: a limited amount of high-quality prints of a certain piece of concept art, will be signed by the artist (and if you want, by the entire team).
 ============================= 
This also includes:

Create an Item ============================= For your contribution, we will work together with you to create an item in the game. With or without stats, useful or useless, serious or silly, your item will be in the final game. (Along with our design team, who will try to keep it within the boundaries and fantasy world of our game. But if you know our sense of humor, we're pretty lenient.) =============================\r\n This also includes: Kickstarter Potion + Signed Divinity Original Sin Kickstarter Box Copy with Printed Manual, Soundtrack CD and Cloth Map + Divinity Original Sin Digital Copy + Soundtrack Digital Download + Developer's Cut Digital (Documents and Videos) + Message in a Bottle + Beta Access + Listed in the Credits, Dragon Level + Name the Undead + Alpha Access + Name a Pet + Write a Dialog + Name a Henchman + Combo Designer + Divinity Fan + Physical Signed Concept Art + Limited Edition Zandalor's Cards

Become an NPC ============================= We will contact you to create an NPC: name it, give it stats, a personal dialog option, and a custom portrait. You'll have to work together with (or against) one of our designers and artists, and in the end, your NPC will be in the final game! =============================\r\nFan Day ============================== A cordial invite will be sent to you to join our Divinity Fan Day. You can bring a friend, and you'll meet the team and other Divinity fans! (You must be able to pay for travel and accommodations.)\r\n ============================= This also includes: Kickstarter Potion + Signed Divinity Original Sin Kickstarter Box Copy with Printed Manual, Soundtrack CD and Cloth Map + Divinity Original Sin Digital Copy + Soundtrack Digital Download + Developer's Cut Digital (Documents and Videos) + Message in a Bottle + Beta Access + Listed in the Credits, Dragon Level + Name the Undead + Alpha Access + Name a Pet + Write a Dialog + Name a Henchman + Combo Designer + Divinity Fan + Physical Signed Concept Art + Create an Item + Limited Edition Zandalor's Cards

Release Party ============================= You think RPGs are epic? You clearly haven't joined a Larian Studios Release Party. This is your chance. You will be invited and expected to our Original Sin Release Party. Rest assured, anything that happens at the release party, stays at the release party. (You must be able to pay for travel and accommodations.) ==============================\r\n1 of the 4 Statues ============================= There are many strange locations, people, creatures and things to find in Original Sin. For instance, you may stumble upon four magical statues. Four crazy, lying statues, that have been granting wishes and making everyone's life miserable. We haven't named them yet. If you hurry, one of them will carry the name of your choosing (within the boundaries of our game world). This name will be in the final game!\r\n ============================= This also includes: Kickstarter Potion + Signed Divinity Original Sin Kickstarter Box Copy with Printed Manual, Soundtrack CD and Cloth Map + Divinity Original Sin Digital Copy + Soundtrack Digital Download + Developer's Cut Digital (Documents and Videos) + Message in a Bottle + Beta Access + Listed in the Credits, Dragon Level + Name the Undead + Alpha Access + Name a Pet + Write a Dialog + Name a Henchman + Combo Designer + Divinity Fan + Physical Signed Concept Art + Create an Item +  Become an NPC + Fan Day + Limited Edition Zandalor's Cards

The Jailer ============================= In Original Sin, you have to watch your step: guards are watching your every move. Citizens react to your actions. If you misbehave (stealing, killing, vandalizing), you may well be thrown in jail. Accidently, we haven't named the jailers yet! For your contribution, you could become one of these jailers. Your jailer-name (created within the guidelines of our fantasy world) will be in the final game, and we'll also make them look like you (as close as we can). 
============================= 
Limited Edition Bellegar's Dice  ============================= 
A set of solid metal role playing dice in a limited edition Bellegar bag. (Physical reward.) 
============================= 
Listed in the Credits, Divine level ============================= 
You will be listed in the credits at Divine level. These credits are also printed in the manual. 
 ============================= This also includes: Kickstarter Potion + Signed Divinity Original Sin Kickstarter Box Copy with Printed Manual, Soundtrack CD and Cloth Map + Divinity Original Sin Digital Copy + Soundtrack Digital Download + Developer's Cut Digital (Documents and Videos) + Message in a Bottle + Beta Access + Listed in the Credits, Divine level + Name the Undead + Alpha Access + Name a Pet + Write a Dialog + Name a Henchman + Combo Designer + Divinity Fan + Physical Signed Concept Art + Create an Item + 
Become an NPC + Fan Day + Release Party + Limited Edition Zandalor's Cards

Mysterious Stranger ============================= Early on in the game, the party can meet a mysterious stranger, whose fate seems intertwined with that of our heroes. His (or her) full story is yet unwritten. His (or her) name, well, a mystery. Work together with our design team to not only choose a name, but also to fill in his (or her) role. Is he on your side? What's the twist? Can (s)he be trusted? Fill in the details, design choices and consequences, and everyone playing Original Sin will be biting their nails when this story unfolds.\r\n ============================= This also includes: Kickstarter Potion + Signed Divinity Original Sin Kickstarter Box Copy with Printed Manual, Soundtrack CD and Cloth Map + Divinity Original Sin Digital Copy + Soundtrack Digital Download + Developer's Cut Digital (Documents and Videos) + Message in a Bottle + Beta Access + Listed in the Credits, Divine level + Name the Undead + Alpha Access + Name a Pet + Write a Dialog + Name a Henchman + Combo Designer + Divinity Fan + Physical Signed Concept Art + Create an Item + \r\nLimited Edition Bellegar's Dice  + Become an NPC + Fan Day + Release Party + You're Invited! + Special Mention on Startup Screen + Limited Edition Zandalor's Cards + Extremely Limited Personalised Shield
